dialogue.describe: We need you to eliminate the threat.
dialogue.offer: We've spotted a few peccatula, we need you to deal with them as they are threatening to disrupt our patrol routes. This is your first mission here, so don't expect payment in cash. Your reward is my trust.
dialogue.rejected: Well, we'll have to assign our people to this now.
dialogue.advice: First time fighting them? I'd recommend some decent gear, since you're unlikely to get by with a kitchen knife or stick. Unless you're skilled enough... anything can happen.
dialogue.success: You got rid of all those peccatula? Well done.
dialogue.success_lie: Ugh... get out and get the job done.
dialogue.failure: Well, I guess those peccatula are our problem now...

dialogue.describe: I've heard from some people about a potentially useful book. Can you find it?
dialogue.offer: I heard that local bookstores sometimes sell a book about surviving a zombie apocalypse. It sounds ridiculous, because if people had information about this event so easily accessible, how did it come to this? But I think it's worth checking. I'll tell you which store I saw such a book in, all you have to do is bring it, or give them your copy if you have one.
dialogue.accepted: The right decision, the reward this time will be appropriate.
dialogue.rejected: Too bad. I think such knowledge would be useful to us, and the reward would allow you to increase your chances of survival.
dialogue.advice: I don't know what you might encounter there, but I don't think it's anything serious. Came, took, left. Like going to the store.
dialogue.inquire: Should I tell you how to get to the library? Do you need an invitation or something?
dialogue.success: Thank you. But the book seems useless in this situation. Well, here you go, it's a reward for your efforts.
dialogue.success_lie: Ugh... get out and get the job done.
dialogue.failure: You even cant bring a book from the bookstore

name: Lost operative
description: Find lost Zwei fixer and bring him back

dialogue.describe: It seems we have found those who may know what is happening in this world, we sent one of our people there but he still hasn't returned.
dialogue.offer: The last we know is that he found interesting papers that could be useful to us. Your task is to get our fixer out of there or at least take the papers and bring them to me.
dialogue.accepted: Great, here are the coordinates. You can head out now.
dialogue.rejected: Well... maybe you're not really suited for this job.
dialogue.advice: If our man failed there, then apparently its really dangerous there. Gather a team or prepare the necessary equipment, anything can happen
dialogue.inquire: Still not on the case? Every minute may count.
dialogue.success: I was briefed on what was going on there. I am impressed with your skills. I think you have earned this award, and now you have access to our equipment and training.
dialogue.success_lie: Ugh... get out and get the job done.
dialogue.failure: Don't worry, you didn't let me down. I expected something like that.
